tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE performance_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_content TEXT
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_performance_metrics(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE,
  performance_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  metrics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  productivity_score INT,
  accuracy_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  report_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE automated_processes (
 process_id INT,
 process_name VARCHAR(50),
 process_description TEXT,
 process_start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 process_end_timestamp TIMESTAMP
 );

CREATE TABLE Employees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Performance (
    employee_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    metric1 INT,
    metric2 INT,
    metric3 INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, performance_date)
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AutomationTasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(50),
    task_description TEXT,
    assigned_to INT,
    due_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE TasksLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    completion_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)
